extract_refs
============

This utility will extract sections from an IMGT gapped reference file. The latest file can be
downloaded `here. <http://www.imgt.org/download/GENE-DB/IMGTGENEDB-ReferenceSequences.fasta-nt-WithGaps-F+ORF+inframeP>`_

.. argparse::
   :filename: ../src/scripts/extract_refs.py
   :func: get_parser
   :prog: extract_refs
